name: Lucky Day Cafe
description:
Opening your own café is a dream come true, but you’ll need a little luck on your side to get it off the ground.

Starting from nothing, you’ll need the help of Lady Luck to make your café a successful business. It takes a roll of the dice (and some planning!) to expand your recipe book, bake goods to sell, and upgrade your café.

Have you got luck on your side? Can you make $100 in day? 

-----

Tips: 

  • More recipes mean more expensive goods to sell
  • Store upgrades attract more customers to your store
  • Pink is a very good color
